lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s tweet celebrated the deli’s reopening and mocked Jeb Bush’s use of the same message with a picture of a handgun.

headline.print_headline: How de Blasio Sees America:  as Pastrami
headline.main: Mayor de Blasio’s America: A Pastrami Sandwich From Carnegie Deli

snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s tweet celebrated the deli’s reopening and mocked Jeb Bush’s use of the same message with a picture of a handgun.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio sends out picture of pastrami sandwich from Carnegie Deli in Manhattan on Twitter, accompanied by word America; tweet is response to one from Jeb Bush in which he also used America to caption image of gun engraved with his name.
